revised_title: Flight Performance and Visual Control of the Free-Flying Housefly
tldr: This study investigates the flight performance and visual control of the free-flying housefly. It examines how houseflies maintain stability and control during flight and how they use visual cues to navigate their environment. The research provides insights into the complex behaviors of insects and their ability to adapt to various conditions.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Insect Biology
